scripts.lint:editorconfig:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "  && npx --ignore-existing --quiet echint && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:readme:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "        && npm run --silent _markdownlint -- ./README.md && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:readme:vim:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "    && npm run --silent _markdownlint -- ./vim/README.md && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:shell:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "         && shellcheck --exclude=SC1090,SC2148 --shell=sh -- shell/*.sh && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "           && vint -- $(npx --ignore-existing --quiet glob-cli2 "vim/{after,autoload/dko*,colors,ftplugin,gvimrc,mine,plugin,vimrc,*.vim}") && echo ' ✓ passed
'
